EmailTemplate.name: Statewide APA Pre-Show
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to register to win a Coach Purse at TN APA Statewide
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We’re headed to Memphis for the Tennessee Statewide Payroll Conference too! and we'd love it if you stopped by our booth to say hello!
We can chat, and if you’re interested, we’ll show you how you & your team, can easily implement a paycard program with minimal effort (less than 3 hours) at ZERO cost to your company.
Avoid the hassle of filling out a form at the conference, & save time.
Click Here and Register to Win a Beautiful Coach Handbag
If you'd like to earn RCH credits & learn more about paycards & paperless pay, please be sure to join us for our speaking session on Thursday, August 14th at 10:50am. During our discussion you'll learn how paycard & pre-paid card growth is trending, what to look for and expect from your current or future paycard provider. Additionally, you'll learn the common obstacles companies encounter when trying to promote paycard use, and more importantly how to overcome them.
So be sure to stop by the rapid! PayCard booth. We’re looking forward to meeting you!
The rapid! PayCard Team 1-888-828-2270 Website - http://www.rapidpaycard.com/
